article_title: Shutdown prompts furloughs for 1,800 in Ohio National Guard
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Washington gridlock has led to work disruptions within the Ohio Army and Air National Guard, which has about 1,800 mechanics, pilots and administrative staff members on furlough because of the federal-government shutdown.
